short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto and AI expansion pack for your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IDRISS extension enhances your browsing experience with crypto micropayments, 
DAO vote alerts, and trading widgets directly in your browser.

- Send and receive crypto on X and Farcaster.
- Get alerts for active DAO votes on Agora, Snapshot, and Tally.
- Trade on Polymarket directly from your X feed.
- Trading copilot: copy onchain moves of your favorite traders (coming soon).

View the source code on GitHub: https://github.com/idriss-xyz/core.

To send feedback or report bugs, please contact us at hello@idriss.xyz.
